/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Trees line the street, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows that add depth to the image.
